DataElementConcept.preferredName: Electronic Cigarette Or Personal Vaporizer Cartridge Dosing Unit Prior Day Per Week Temporal Frequency Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A battery-powered atomizer designed to aerosolize a liquid solution for inhalation._A dosing unit equal to the amount of active ingredient(s) contained in a cartridge._Earlier in time or order._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._For each, generally denoting a ratio._Any period of seven consecutive days._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period._To put into action or service.

Concepts.definition: Earlier in time or order.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
To put into action or service.
